column3:
Good catch.

But you add one missing check and you make changes all over the file. Can you please change this to just make the _one_ change suggested in the pull title?

ACK in that case.

All changes are mentioned in the commit-msg, so you also choose to remove the space after : when logging stuff. This doesn't need a discussion at all if you could just credit what I'm doing and tell me please use 2 commits for example or that you will NACK all minor stuff I try to get in recently ^^.\n

1) Isolated commits are good. If you can solve a problem with a one-line change, you're a ninja
2) I'm indeed trying to tone down on the minor stuff. I'm getting a bit overworked, so I'm trying hard to focus on what matters
3) Ancillary changes can unnecessarily break other pulls, there has been a bit of annoyance about that lately

So: please, do only the mentioned fix, and leave the rest of
Just because the space after function name is not needed, I had a discussion with @laanwj about that. Uppercase just because of consistency... Deserialize is also uppercase.\n
